metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38648 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Batik of Apache XMLGraphics allows an attacker to fetch external resources. This issue affectsApache XML Graphics Batik 1.14.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38648` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbatik-java - 1.10-2~18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: batik package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.10-2~18.04.1').
